name: A nice day
description:
Note: If something goes wrong while playing, it highly probably because there are a lot of bugs that haven't been fixed yet because of the tight time.

This is a text-based puzzle game. You need to get to the right scene at the right time, otherwise, you will miss the plot and the clue in the dialogue. Your experience on this day determines what will happen at the end of that day. And you need to find your OWN WAY out of this loop day.

The demo video shows the correct answer to the puzzle, the left top small screen shows if you failed to show up at the right time.

HINT: You'll find a HIDDEN CLOCK and a LOOPDAY TRACKER in the transition scene UI. The Hidden Clock indicates the right time to leave the current scene, with this piece of information you could calculate the right enter time for this scene.  The number on the Loopday Tracker will tell you how many times you've been stuck in this endless world. Try to find a hidden ending as well. :)

Instruction:

W= Forward Walking, W+Shift = Happy Forward Walking

A = Left Move, S = Back Move, D = Right Move

Mouse Right = View Control, Mouse Middel = Front View Control

F = Start Talking (Mouse Left = Next Sentence)/Interact, Space = Jump (Hold Space = Weird Backflip)

ESC = Quest Check
